creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: sheet of studies; man in hat, LL corner; figural shapes, top half of sheet; on verso, man semi-reclining
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash, red and black chalk
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Study of an Old Testament Prophet and other Figure Studies (recto); Study of a Male Figure with a Rope (verso)
